description:
The Shape Builder Tool in Adobe Illustrator is a very easy tool to use , yet very powerful .

What can you do with it ? Well , like its name hints , you can build shapes !

With the Shape Builder Tool , you can create more complex objects from simple objects , using it's different functions , and so , you can create graphics of real world objects from simple shapes .

Even if you are a complete beginner , you can still take this course , because this course starts from absolute scratch , teaching you the basics you will need , and then moves on to the Shape Builder Tool .

So basically , you learn how to create simple shapes , then how to turn those simple shapes into graphics of real world objects .
title: Build Shapes With The Shape Builder Tool - Adobe Illustrator
